Articles.Content: I recently started playing again and saw they updated the Mun ground textures. I have all graphical settings at max and it looks like this

F5 (quick save) F9 (quick load)

this happens from time to time in 1.8.

Saw that for the first time in 1.9.0 I reported it as a bug https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/24900

in 1.8 it was a weird shaking that I saw nothing like this
